name: Rustic Country Wedding Invitation Sample Set
description:
Rustic Country Wedding Invitation Sample Set FREE Shipping within the US

ANNOUNCE YOUR BIG DAY IN STYLE WITH A BEAUTIFUL, ROMANTIC OLD POSTER WEDDING INVITATION!

Imagine the look on your guests faces when they receive an invitation to a wedding that is unique as you are! Your invitations will be a gift in itself, a wonderfully keepsake for anyone. 

~~*{WHAT THE LISTING INCLUDES}*~~

This listing is for a sample set ONLY. I highly recommend ordering a sample set before making a large order as colors sometimes appear different on your monitor than they do in real life. 

Sample Set includes: 
1- 5 x 7 sample invitation with envelope
1- 4 ½ x 5 ½ RSVP postcard (no envelope- front and back of RSVP card shown)

Can’t wait for samples? Contact me and I can make your digital samples to approve at no charge. 
Please also take a look at my ship announcement to see my current turnaround time for orders.

~~~~~~~*{PRICING}*~~~~~~~

Price is $3.00 per set. A set includes the following:
Invitation + Envelope and RSVP Postcard.

I have a minimum order of 25 sets. 
I do give discounts on orders over 150 sets. Please contact me if you are placing an order over 150 for pricing and turnaround time.

~~~~~~~*{HOW TO ORDER}*~~~~~~~

Once you are ready to place a full order contact me so we can start working together. 

Here is how to process works:

- When you are ready to place and order please send me how many sets you are looking to order and your custom wording. It is best to have the final wording before we begin the process.

- I will then send you digital samples for you to approve with your custom wording on them. Please look over the wording carefully as the customer is responsible for all text provided.

-If you would like to see physical samples simply purchase this design listing and I’ll send you a sample within 2 business days.

- You are allowed 3 small changes after I send you the digital samples. (Font and color changes can also be made to suit your event.)

- If you would like additional changes or design alterations let me know and we can discuss cost.

- Once you have approved the digital samples I will send you a PayPal Invoice. Work begins on your order once payment has cleared. 

~~~~~~~*{SHIPPING}*~~~~~~~

Samples (Domestic): USPS First Class Mail (2-5 days within the US) 
Samples (International): USPS First Class Mail (6-10 days outside the US)

Full Orders (Domestic): USPS Priority Mail (2-3 days within the US)
Full Orders (International): USPS Express Shipping (3-5 days outside the US)

Shipping pricing is dependent on the size of your order and location. I will let you know shipping cost when I give you a quote for your order.

For International orders please visit my policy page and read about international shipping. 

~~~~~~~*{MATERIALS}*~~~~~~~

Invitations are printed on a linen textured paper. Envelopes are cream in color and made from 30% recycled materials. They are created using water based inks. 

~~~~~~~*{EXTRAS}*~~~~~~~

$5 per sheet of 30 return address labels
$5 per sheet of 10 shipping address labels (You must send me an excel sheet of addresses)

Thanks for stopping by and I look forward to working with you!

Don’t forget to add me to your favorites!
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/cdpinvites
“Like” us on Facebook!

-Adrianne 
Cottontail Digital Press
